description: Replaces configuration for an Object Lambda Access Point. The following actions are related to PutAccessPointConfigurationForObjectLambda:

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The account ID for the account that owns the specified Object Lambda Access Point.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the Object Lambda Access Point.

parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: Object Lambda Access Point configuration document. Standard access point associated with the Object Lambda Access Point. CloudWatchMetricsEnabled (boolean) --- A container for whether the CloudWatch metrics configuration is enabled. AllowedFeatures (list) --- A container for allowed features. Valid inputs are GetObject-Range, GetObject-PartNumber, HeadObject-Range, and HeadObject-PartNumber. (string) --- A container for transformation configurations for an Object Lambda Access Point. (dict) --- A configuration used when creating an Object Lambda Access Point transformation. A container for the action of an Object Lambda Access Point configuration. Valid inputs are GetObject, ListObjects, HeadObject, and ListObjectsV2. (string) --- A container for the content transformation of an Object Lambda Access Point configuration. AwsLambda (dict) --- A container for an Lambda function. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function. FunctionPayload (string) --- Additional JSON that provides supplemental data to the Lambda function used to transform objects.

nested_params.name: SupportingAccessPoint
nested_params.description: Standard access point associated with the Object Lambda Access Point.

nested_params.name: CloudWatchMetricsEnabled
nested_params.description: A container for whether the CloudWatch metrics configuration is enabled.

nested_params.name: AllowedFeatures
nested_params.description: A container for allowed features. Valid inputs are GetObject-Range, GetObject-PartNumber, HeadObject-Range, and HeadObject-PartNumber.

nested_params.name: TransformationConfigurations
nested_params.description: A container for transformation configurations for an Object Lambda Access Point.

nested_params.name: Actions
nested_params.description: A container for the action of an Object Lambda Access Point configuration. Valid inputs are GetObject, ListObjects, HeadObject, and ListObjectsV2.

nested_params.name: ContentTransformation
nested_params.description: A container for the content transformation of an Object Lambda Access Point configuration.

nested_params.name: AwsLambda
nested_params.description: A container for an Lambda function.

nested_params.name: FunctionArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function.

nested_params.name: FunctionPayload
nested_params.description: Additional JSON that provides supplemental data to the Lambda function used to transform objects.
